com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.cooldownitem

Class AbstractThrowableItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.AbstractCustomItem
      • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.cooldownitem.AbstractCooldownItem
        • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.cooldownitem.AbstractConsumableItem
          • com.github.mlefeb01.spigotutils.plugin.customitem.cooldownitem.AbstractThrowableItem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Named

    public abstract class AbstractThrowableItem
extends AbstractConsumableItem
    An extension of AbstractConsumableItem that when the item is consumed, will launch a projectile. This class provides two new methods lifecycle methods - when the projectile is initially launched and when the projectile hits
